fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Use an ability from any animal factions. (Day/Night Ability)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may not use an ability from the same faction twice, additionally, you can only use a killing ability once.
- Allowed factions:
> Werewolves, Thundercry, Pok√©mon, Foxes, Koopas, Beasts, Frogs, Monkeys, Faunae, Locusts and Mutants..
